Title: Relates to the offense of aggressive driving
Summary: Creates the crime of aggressive driving which shall be a misdemeanor; provides that any person who increases the speed of their vehicle while another person tries to pass, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Add ยง1212-a, amd ยง1122, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the offense of aggressive driving
